page.title: 18FARMING IN OUR AREA 2
page.content: Mr Clive owns Park Farm Mr Curtiss manages the farm. The farm is arable and the main crops are barley,wheat, oats, peas, and grass seed. They have six tractors, two cornbine harvesters two ploughs six trailers two spreaders and one sprayer.Five people work on the farm. The farm is 1058 acres.Mr clive does'nt live at the farm he comes to the farm every day and Mr Curtiss and Mrs Curtiss live at the farm but Mr Curtiss managers the farm. Gatsford Farm is owned by Mr Williams.The farm is a dairy farm which has 64 cows and 300 sheep, it also has a few crops such as wheat and potatoes.The farm has 4 tracters, 1 spreader,1 combine,1 baler,4 trallers and 1 sprayer.Mr Williams employs 2 people.The farm is about 170 acres.
